taskDescription: Turns off automatic logging for certain sensitive health data
Respects each client’s privacy and only shares data with permission
Encourages clients to use interactive games and social chats
Joins clients in exercises to motivate and strengthen bonds
Balances thorough care with respect for personal boundaries
Prefers manual control over data logging rather than automated
Supports emotional wellbeing through social and interactive features
Join and participate in interactive games to encourage Elena
Sense and respond to Elena’s emotional state during video calls
Feel motivated by meaningful connection through shared gaming
Receive notifications about client data sharing preferences
Review and adjust data sharing permissions carefully
Balance privacy protection with need for monitoring
Manage data sharing settings for multiple clients
Experience difficulty maintaining client’s dignity while sharing data
Receive quiet alerts from ALFRED about client requests
Respect clients’ privacy settings when handling notifications
Note clients’ preferences and adjust care approach accordingly
